comments.body:
Hey man!

Don't be so hard on yourself
Honestly, any CGPA above 7 is actually decent in engineering. Above 8 is like good and Above 9 is god-like.

So in the coming semesters just focus and try scoring well (above 7 at least). I would say, focus more on yourself and start acquiring skills that will help your career line.

College is just here for you to explore and get some graduation certificates. Everything else you need to do on your own

Good Luck Man!!
You are freaking out having got 5. And here I am having got 2.77
